channel.title: Reserved Instances Budget :: My Blog Page
channel.description: Overview In this section, you will learn how to create and configure an AWS Reservation Budget to monitor the utilization and coverage of your Reserved Instances (RIs). Note ℹ️ Information: Reserved Instances provide significant discounts (up to 72%) compared to On-Demand pricing when you commit to a one-year or three-year term for specific AWS resources like EC2 instances, RDS databases, or ElastiCache nodes.
